Paragraph.Text: Your CPH is equipped with a default cloning fail-safe. If for some reason you should, you know... die... then your CPH is capable of reconstructing your body and (Depending on difficulty) some or all of your inventory.

After building your Cloning Vat in a stack, 3 blocks high, simply provide it with enough power to grow a new clone, then select it and press Interact (E). From then on if, or indeed when, you die, you'll spawn back at the same location.
This location is also used as the default spawn location for new players on multiplayer servers.
Clones will spawn with low health, so to this end, you may wish to spawn next to the Medical Bay.
